name: moxie

effect.sword-shield: This Pokémon's Attack rises one stage upon knocking out another Pokémon, even a friendly Pokémon. This ability does not take effect when the Pokémon indirectly causes another Pokémon to faint, e.g. through poison or spikes. If this Pokémon knocks out a Pokémon with mummy, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

If this Pokémon knocks out a Pokémon with mummy, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

short_effect: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
